claim_summary: Act 887 of 2025 §§5-7 appropriate $4,500,000 for nursing home closure costs, $100,000 for long-term care facility receivership expenses, and $4,000,000 for nursing home quality grants under the Division of Medical Services.

source.title: Act 887 of 2025 – Nursing Home Closure and Quality Grants (Sections 5-7)
